EditTextPreference.android:title: Bitmap Sample Size
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Change the inSampleSize of the Bitmap from the camera. 1/x, so bigger numbers mean smaller bitmaps. (Default: 4)

EditTextPreference.android:title: Block Size
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Change the size of the block around the selected pixel. (Default: 5)
Change the constant subtracted from the final thresholding value. (Default: 10)
